Service Details: Supplies food and help for people with social and economic problems, who are in emergency situations. Please call the number closest to the area in which you live, leave a message, and a volunteer will return your call:Rutland: 250.765.0800, St. Teresa, RutlandDowntown: 250.826.5562, Immaculate Conception (serves from Bernard Ave to Raymer Ave and Okanagan Lake to Benvoulin Rd)Lower Mission: 250.860.2536, St. Charles Garnier (serves south of Raymer Ave, East Kelowna & Gordon House)Glenmore: 250.762.2577, St. Pius X (serves area from Bernard Ave north to Glenmore area)West Kelowna: 250.801.5905, Our Lady of Lourdes Conference (serves the area of West Kelowna from the bridge to Peachland)
Languages: English ; *some volunteers may speak other languages
